sentence: https://t.co/gIRV6zw7XO — Josh Mandel (@JoshMandelOhio) January 21, 2022 Intel has multiple factories in the U.S. already, including in Oregon, New Mexico, and Arizona.
author: Lucas Nolan
title: ‘Silicon Heartland:’ Intel Chooses Ohio to Build Largest Chip Factory ‘on the Planet’

sentence: During the fiery hour-and-a-half event between Republican Josh Mandel and Democrat Morgan Harper, Mandel repeatedly attacked Ryan for failing to debate Harper so far and portrayed it as fundamental disrespect among state Democrats for their Black voter base.
author: JULIE CARR SMYTH
title: Tim Ryan, not onstage, is early focus of Ohio Senate event

sentence: During the fiery hour-and-a-half event between Republican Josh Mandel and Democrat Morgan Harper, Mandel repeatedly attacked Ryan for failing to debate Harper so far and portrayed it as fundamental disrespect among state Democrats for their Black voter base.
author: Julie Carr Smyth
title: Tim Ryan, not onstage, is early focus of Ohio Senate event

sentence: Harper, 38, shot back: “What we don’t need to happen is have Josh Mandel talk for the Black community.” At one point, Mandel called Harper a “looney Nancy Pelosi” for “advocating for all this green energy” when Harper pledged to support renewable energy to help mitigate climate change.
author: Liz Skalka
title: A Hard-Right Republican And A Progressive Debated. It Went As Well As You'd Expect.

sentence: Career politician Josh Mandel called investment banker Mike Gibbons a “p---y” under his breath at the end of the heated exchange.
author: Joseph Wilkinson
title: Republican Ohio Senate candidate calls opponent ‘p---y’ in near-altercation at debate

sentence: The debate became intense almost as soon as it began as former state Treasurer Josh Mandel attacked investment banker Mike Gibbons’ business dealings.
author: Associated Press
title: Fight at Ohio GOP Senate debate elevates military issue
